data.text:
We had a fantastic stay at JA Ocean View

My Grandson is Autistic, Sunjoy from the main restaurant is so kind, he upgraded us to the executive suite for breakfast.

The room is very spacious, huge bed.

Food is excellent, lots of choices.

The location is perfect, many shops, restaurants, also have McDonaldâ€™s, KFC, Burger King and Pizza Hut right next door all 24 hours.

The hotel is beautiful, lovely pool area, tennis courts, gym and salon.

The beach is so beautiful, 2 minute walk away.

Taxi right outside, use the hotel taxi, they are better and match the price of Careem.

You cannot buy alcohol so bring it with you or go to the marina mall to Waitrose, go down two escalators to the car park and there is a place that sells really cheap alcohol, you will need to take a passport with you.

Use Klook to book all your excursions to save money.

I asked the hotel for extra pillows and 30 hangers and it was promptly provided.

Favourite staff Julie and Sunjoy from the main restaurant, they are so friendly, helpful and kind.

The location of the hotel is perfect, right near beach and walking distance to the Marina and Marina Mall
data.title: Perfect stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear suemB3962BD, 
Thank you for choosing JA Ocean View and for sharing your perfect stay experience with us on TripAdvisor!
We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic time with us. It's heartwarming to know that Sujoy from the main restaurant went above and beyond to ensure your comfort, and we're delighted that you enjoyed the upgrade to the executive suite for breakfast. We strive to provide spacious and comfortable accommodations for all our guests, and we're glad you found the room to your liking.
We're pleased that you enjoyed the variety and excellence of our food offerings, as well as the convenience of our location with its nearby shops and restaurants. It's wonderful to hear that you appreciated the facilities and amenities we have to offer, including the pool area, tennis courts, gym, and salon.
Thank you for your valuable tips for fellow travelers and for highlighting the exceptional service provided by our staff, especially Julie and Sujoy. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to them.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to let us know.
Warm regards,
Tim Quarm 
Regional General Manager
owner_response.author: Tim Quarm

data.text:
my mother and I spend one week at JA Oceanview Hotel, and had a wonderful experience! When we arrived, we asked for a disabled access room, and the staff were happy to accommodate us immediately.

The hotel is located at the JBR walk neighborhood, which in my opinion, is the best place to stay in Dubai. It is right by the beach, and also surrounded by high-quality restaurants and shops, and five minutes drive to Dubai Marina Mall. Most importantly, the service is impeccable.
Special thanks Mr. Hashim and Ms. Merry, Who made us feel like home!

I highly recommend this hotel, and will definitely consider coming back in our future trips.
data.title: Outstanding

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 846navidm, 
Thank you for choosing to stay at JA Oceanview Hotel and for taking the time to share your outstanding experience with us on TripAdvisor!
We are delighted to hear that you and your mother had a wonderful week with us. It's fantastic to know that our team was able to accommodate your request for a disabled access room promptly, ensuring your comfort from the moment you arrived.
We're thrilled that you found our hotel's location in the JBR walk neighborhood to be ideal, with its proximity to the beach, restaurants, shops, and Dubai Marina Mall. Our team takes great pride in delivering impeccable service, and we're so pleased that Mr. Hashim and Ms. Merry made your stay feel like home.
Thank you for recommending our hotel, and we would be honored to welcome you back on your future trips to Dubai. Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything we can assist you with in the meantime.
Warm regards,
Tim Quarm 
Regional General Manager
owner_response.author: Tim Quarm

data.text:
The hotel is in a good location for the JBR area and easily accessible to the beach, nearby restaurants , taxis, trams etc. It's quite far from the Palm, Burk Khalifa and Downtown, but nowhere is really close together in Dubai.
Room was OK, sea and Dubai wheel view. 
Restaurants generally fine, decent breakfast and Italian and sports bar dining options. 
Bit disappointed as at check in the staff asked if we were there for a special occasion (we we're - our 20th anniversary) and intimated that they would do something on the day. It came and went with no gesture from the hotel. I didn't expect anything beforehand, so why say something and no do it.
data.title: Anniversary Dubai trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear T4936HOandrewf, 
Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.
We're glad to hear that you found our hotel's location convenient for exploring the JBR area and enjoying the nearby amenities. We're also pleased that you enjoyed the sea and Dubai Wheel view from your room, as well as the dining options offered at our restaurants.
However, we sincerely apologize for the disappointment regarding your 20th anniversary celebration. We understand the importance of such special occasions, and it's regrettable that we didn't meet your expectations in this regard. Your feedback is valuable, and we will review our processes to ensure that such oversights do not occur in the future.
We appreciate your patronage and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more memorable experience.
Warm regards,
Tim Quarm 
Regional General Manager
owner_response.author: Tim Quarm

data.text: We stayed for 4 days in March, a wonderful room on the 18th floor with fabulous sea views day and night. The staff were very helpful, the hotel and facilities lovely and very clean.  The breakfast offered loads of choice and was delicious.  We swapped back and forward from the pool to the beach which was easy and convenient to do.  We enjoyed our stay and happy to recommend staying here.
data.title: Very enjoyable stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear vandradeacon,
Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us on TripAdvisor!
We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your 4-day stay with us and that you found your room on the 18th floor to be wonderful, offering fabulous sea views day and night. It's fantastic to know that our staff was helpful and that you found the hotel and facilities lovely and very clean.
We're glad you enjoyed the breakfast with its loads of choices and delicious offerings. It's also great to hear that you found it easy and convenient to swap between the pool and the beach during your stay.
Thank you for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future!
Best regards,
Tim Quarm 
Regional General Manager
owner_response.author: Tim Quarm

data.text:
Hotel staff very helpful, arranged for us to have an early checkin which was most appreciated after a night flight.
Half board option had a broad selection of foods for all tastes, nothing too much trouble for waiters and waitresses. Room spotless and cleaned daily.
data.title: Nice Stay at JA

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear davewill1066, 
Thank you for choosing to stay at JA Ocean View Hotel and for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our team was able to assist you with an early check-in, making your arrival more comfortable after your night flight. It's fantastic to know that you found our half board option to your liking, with a broad selection of foods catering to all tastes. We take pride in our cleanliness standards, and we're pleased to hear that your room was spotless and well-maintained throughout your stay.
We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay at JA Ocean View Hotel in the future.
Warm regards,
Tim Quarm 
Regional General Manager
owner_response.author: Tim Quarm
